sqlMap.select:
select t.id, if(ISNULL(tsk.taskName),"",tsk.taskName) as taskName, if(ISNULL(dev.deviceName),"",dev.deviceName) as deviceName, t.longitude, t.latitude, t.elevation, t.X, t.Y, t.Z, t.speed, DATE_FORMAT(t.satelliteTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as satelliteTime, t.direction, t.GPSStatus, t.compactId, t.CMV, t.RMV, t.frequency, t.F1, t.F2, t.F3, t.temperature, t.angle, t.sensor, t.imageAddress, DATE_FORMAT(t.serverTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as serverTime, t.isValid, (@rownum := @rownum + 1) as rownum from (select @rownum := 0 from DUAL) r, sc_positiondata t LEFT JOIN sc_device dev on dev.id=t.deviceId LEFT JOIN sc_task tsk on tsk.id=t.taskId where 1=1
tsk.taskName like '%$taskName$%'
tsk.beginStNum =#beginStNum#
tsk.endStNum =#endStNum#
dev.deviceName like '%$deviceName$%'
t.speed =#speed#
t.serverTime =#serverTime#
order by $order$
$orderDes$
order by t.id desc
limit #start#
#size#

select GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT('[',CONCAT_Ws(',',t.id,t.deviceId,t.CMV,t.frequency,1,t.satelliteTime,t.GPSStatus,t.speed,t.elevation,t.Y,t.X),']')) as pd from sc_positiondata t where t.satelliteTime BETWEEN #startDT# and #endDT#

select count(1) from sc_positiondata t LEFT JOIN sc_device dev on dev.id=t.deviceId LEFT JOIN sc_task tsk on tsk.id=t.taskId where 1=1
tsk.taskName like '%$taskName$%'
dev.deviceName like '%$deviceName$%'
select t.id,t.id as name from sc_positiondata t order by t.id desc
select CONCAT_WS(',',CMV,frequency,0,satelliteTime,GPSStatus,speed,elevation,longitude,latitude) as dataList from sc_positiondata t where deviceId = #deviceId# order by id desc limit 0,1
sqlMap.insert:
insert into sc_positiondata ( taskId, deviceId, longitude, latitude, elevation, X, Y, Z, speed, satelliteTime, direction, GPSStatus, compactId, CMV, RMV, frequency, F1, F2, F3, temperature, angle, sensor, imageAddress, serverTime, isValid ) values ( #taskId#, #deviceId#, #longitude#, #latitude#, #elevation#, #X#, #Y#, #Z#, #speed#, #satelliteTime#, #direction#, #GPSStatus#, #compactId#, #CMV#, #RMV#, #frequency#, #F1#, #F2#, #F3#, #temperature#, #angle#, #sensor#, #imageAddress#, SYSDATE(), #isValid# )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: update sc_positiondata set taskId=#taskId#, deviceId=#deviceId#, longitude=#longitude#, latitude=#latitude#, elevation=#elevation#, X=#X#, Y=#Y#, Z=#Z#, speed=#speed#, satelliteTime=#satelliteTime#, direction=#direction#, GPSStatus=#GPSStatus#, compactId=#compactId#, CMV=#CMV#, RMV=#RMV#, frequency=#frequency#, F1=#F1#, F2=#F2#, F3=#F3#, temperature=#temperature#, angle=#angle#, sensor=#sensor#, imageAddress=#imageAddress#, serverTime=SYSDATE(), isValid=#isValid# where id=#id#
sqlMap.select:
select t.id, t.taskId, t.deviceId, t.longitude, t.latitude, t.elevation, t.X, t.Y, t.Z, t.speed, DATE_FORMAT(t.satelliteTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as satelliteTime, t.direction, t.GPSStatus, t.compactId, t.CMV, t.RMV, t.frequency, t.F1, t.F2, t.F3, DATE_FORMAT(t.serverTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as serverTime from sc_positiondata t where 1=1 and t.isValid=1
t.taskId=#taskId#
t.deviceId=#deviceId#
t.id > #positionId#
t.serverTime between #startTime# and #endTime#
order by serverTime asc limit 0,1

select t.id, t.taskId, t.deviceId, t.longitude, t.latitude, t.elevation, t.X, t.Y, t.Z, t.speed, DATE_FORMAT(t.satelliteTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as satelliteTime, t.direction, t.GPSStatus, t.compactId, t.CMV, t.RMV, t.frequency, t.F1, t.F2, t.F3, DATE_FORMAT(t.serverTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as serverTime from sc_positiondata t where 1=1 and t.isValid=1
t.taskId in ($taskIds$)
t.deviceId in ($deviceIds$)
t.serverTime = #serverTime#
order by serverTime asc

select DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(t.serverTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as serverTime from sc_positiondata t where 1=1 and t.isValid=1
t.taskId in ($taskIds$)
t.deviceId in ($deviceIds$)
t.serverTime between #startTime# and #endTime#
order by serverTime asc

select t1.*,t2.x,t2.y from (select t.rpid,t.pid,t.times,t.matchTime,t.deviceId from ( select rpid,pid,times,matchTime,deviceId from sc_processrangeptdata where 1=1
taskId in ($taskIds$)
deviceId in ($deviceIds$)
matchTime between #startTime# and #endTime#
order by matchTime desc ) t group by t.PId,t.rpid order by t.matchTime asc ) t1 join sc_rangeptdata t2 on t1.rpid=t2.id
